ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Newbie Here
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello JesusAmetx@aol.com I play quinlen in the europeon server the second one down. I will be on a little later on around 6:00pm or so. I will email you to let
ygData.messageBody:
Hello JesusAmetx@...

I play quinlen in the europeon server the second one down. I will be on a little later on around 6:00pm or so. I will email you to let you know when if you want to crete a charactor there just to learn somethings and then you can go back to your next charactor.

jesus4metx@... wrote:

Hi everyone.  I just got the game Everquest and am so confused!  I read through the manual and can get around but how do you cast spells, talk to people around you, etc.??  I'm about to give up lol.  I'd tell you my characters name but I can't remember. :)  She is in the first world though.  Thanks ahead of time for any advice/help you can give me!
Keri
